criterion: The note includes all necessary patient demographics.
The note accurately reflects the patient's medical history and current medications.
The note includes a clear and concise assessment and plan.
The note does not include any unnecessary or irrelevant information.
The note does not contain any incorrect or outdated medical information.
The note does not demonstrate a lack of understanding or misinterpretation of the patient's condition.
The note is written in a clear and concise manner, easy to understand.
The note does not include any obvious errors or typos.
The note does not provide any conflicting or contradictory information.
The note does not omit any crucial information or details.
